metadata.title: CVE-2019-16935 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The documentation XML-RPC server in Python through 2.7.16, 3.x through3.6.9, and 3.7.x through 3.7.4 has XSS via the server_title field. Thisoccurs in Lib/DocXMLRPCServer.py in Python 2.x, and in Lib/xmlrpc/server.pyin Python 3.x. If set_server_title is called with untrusted input,arbitrary JavaScript can be delivered to clients that visit the http URLfor this server.

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
